en.botic:contentCards_card1_header: Deploy bots that understand your global customers
en.botic:contentCards_card1_subtitle: SiniticAI™ is the natural language processing engine with extreme adaptability for new languages.
en.botic:contentCards_card2_subtitle: Automate your customer support with trained machine-learning models from our priority sectors.
en.botic:contentCards_card3_subtitle: For a client with 90,000 customer support requests per day, SiniticAI™ performs with 11% higher Chinese accuracy than a brand-name NLP engine.
en.botic:contentCards_card4_subtitle: Our engineers are at forefront of natural language processing research
en.botic:processDetailsWidget_heading: Automation isn't magic. Here's how it works.
en.botic:processDetailsWidget_step1_leftCar: Rapidly convert chat history into bot dialogue. Don't spend months manually labelling.
en.botic:processDetailsWidget_step1_rightCa: SiniticAI™ predicts the correct human intent from multilingual customer support requests.
en.botic:processDetailsWidget_step2_leftCar: Our NLP experts set the confidence threshold for intent detection, based on a top-k heuristic.
en.botic:processDetailsWidget_step2_rightCa: Your chatbot sends correct replies to humans, or passes the conversation to an agent.
en.botic:processDetailsWidget_step3_leftCar: Observe increased support automation and customer satisfaction.
en.botic:processDetailsWidget_step3_rightCa: Accept dialogue suggestions to retrain machine-learning models.
en.botic:tabs:heading:tab1:heading: Multilingual
en.botic:tabs:heading:tab1:leftCard:tabDeta: 1 Natural language processing engines excel at English, but they fail to deliver high accuracy for other major languages.
en.botic:tabs:heading:tab1:rightCard:tabDet: SiniticAI™ natively supports multiple languages, and understands mixed language text using deep learning techniques adapted from image-matching technology.

fr.botic:processDetailsWidget_heading: Automation isn’t magic. Here’s how it works
fr.botic:processDetailsWidget_step1_leftCar: Use chat history to build chatbot dialogue and conduct initial BoticAI training.
fr.botic:processDetailsWidget_step1_rightCa: BoticAI predicts the correct human intent from multilingual support requests.
fr.botic:processDetailsWidget_step2_leftCar: Our NLP experts set the confidence threshold for intent detection, based on a top-k heuristic.
fr.botic:processDetailsWidget_step2_rightCa: Your chatbot sends correct replies to humans, or passes the conversation to an agent
fr.botic:processDetailsWidget_step3_leftCar: Substantial customer support automation and increased customer satisfaction
fr.botic:processDetailsWidget_step3_rightCa: BoticAI increases automation by re-training on live chat history.
